page.title: 09HOME LIFE OF A CHILD IN 1985
page.content:
On Saturdays I wake up at 8 o'clock and get dressed. On hot days I wear shorts and a T-shirt or a skirt and T-shirt, and on cold days I wear a jumper and trousers or a thick dress. I have my breakfast which might be Rice Krispies or Sugar Puffs, and after breakfast I sometimes watch T.V. or go on the climbing frame.
Sometimes I go to call for my friends and we go to the shops to buy some sweets.
For lunch I may have roast chicken, roast potatoes, peas, cabbage and gravy.
We often go to the beach in the afternoon, then go home for tea, which is sandwiches and cake. When I go to bed I can read for a little while.
